articles.author: AP
articles.title: Gap grows between TikTok users, lawmakers on potential ban - Economic Times
articles.description: The disconnect illustrates the uphill battle that lawmakers from both sides of the aisle face in trying to convince the public that China could use TikTok as a weapon against the American people.
articles.content: On the one side are dozens of lawmakers on Capitol Hill issuing dire warnings about security breaches and possible Chinese surveillance.On the other are some 150 million TikTok users in the U.S. who … [+5160 chars]
